originalText.text: The food is fine, had better, but very small portion in comparison to the price. It's not really worth the cost for a tiny sample and also to be mindful - unfortunately, there are large rats at least 3 passing within the outside eating area of the restaurant within its vicinity. The avocado sauce, in my humble opinion, tastes better overall than the roasted tomatilles in case when comparing sauces. Additionally, place is very petty with their sauce, quite small, and should at least be three sauces for three tacos ordered; especially for the price. On the bright side, the horecta tasted fresh üëç

originalText.text: Love that this place is open so late! I was sooo full after eating my 3 tacos it fills you up!! The employees are all so nice and the place is amazing itself. There is mainly outdoor seating but there is indoor seating as well. Will definitely stop by again!

text.text: Love that this place is open so late! I was sooo full after eating my 3 tacos it fills you up!! The employees are all so nice and the place is amazing itself. There is mainly outdoor seating but there is indoor seating as well. Will definitely stop by again!

originalText.text:
Great authentic tacos. They have a wide variety of tacos, burritos, and quesadillas. I ordered the s special taco of the month. The shrimp mango tacit which was delicious, I ordered the pastor and a beef and cheese taco. All very good and super affordable. My mom tried the green rice and the Manhattan and system Island taco in hard shell. The liked them a lot! I tried the green rice it was very well seasoned.

To top it off I had some churros. Freshly fried crispy and some Caramel dipping sauce.

They did take a while to prepare the order so I'd say call and order in advance. Especially if it's during lunch hours. Cause I called in and still had to wait some time before I received my order. Other than that staff are pleasant. Food is fresh.

originalText.text: Ummm the food was good but are they amazing? No unfortunately.   Tacos should be amazing or not exist at all. First off take your time warming up the tortillas.  Half cold tortillas are not tasty. I guess these tacos have too many condiments.   The best tacos are just good warm meat, good salsa, and hot tortillas.  The biggest downfall is that this restaurant is tiny with no good seating options.  Not sure how they offer Berria, carnitas, grilled fish, fried fish, and ten more options from a tiny kitchen.  In Mexico,  just one option takes up the whole kitchen. My guess is either frozen or trucked in from a central kitchen???

originalText.text: The tacos were delicious.  Just pick one. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. It‚Äôs more of a take out place.  A few tables inside and out.  The people working there seemed  like they all had a gun to their head. No napkins in the dispenser and there was no hurry to fill it although a steady stream of customers were in and out. It happens I guess.  Take out is the way here.
